statements: SELECT * FROM shipping_notifications;
SELECT notification_id, order_id, status FROM shipping_notifications WHERE order_id = 12345;
SELECT message, status FROM shipping_notifications WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM shipping_notifications ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT notification_id, order_id FROM shipping_notifications WHERE status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY notification_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM shipping_notifications WHERE status = 'Shipped';
SELECT notification_id, order_id FROM shipping_notifications WHERE message LIKE '%delay%';
SELECT DISTINCT status FROM shipping_notifications ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT message, created_at FROM shipping_notifications WHERE order_id = 1001 AND status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_notifications FROM shipping_notifications WHERE status = 'Processing';
SELECT * FROM shipping_notifications;
SELECT id, customer_email, order_id, notification_type FROM shipping_notifications;
SELECT customer_email, notification_type, order_id FROM shipping_notifications ORDER BY customer_email DESC;
SELECT notification_id, trigger_event, trigger_timestamp FROM update_triggers WHERE trigger_event = 'update';
SELECT * FROM update_triggers WHERE trigger_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM shipping_notifications WHERE order_id = 100
SELECT customer_email, notification_type FROM shipping_notifications WHERE order_id = 200
SELECT * FROM update_triggers WHERE trigger_event = 'update' ORDER BY trigger_timestamp DESC
SELECT order_id, customer_email FROM shipping_notifications WHERE notification_type = 'delayed'
SELECT * FROM shipping_notifications WHERE customer_email = 'example@example.com'
SELECT * FROM shipping_notifications WHERE status = 'Shipped';
SELECT id, order_id, status FROM shipping_notifications WHERE order_id = 12345;
SELECT message FROM shipping_notifications WHERE id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM shipping_trigger_logs ORDER BY trigger_time DESC;
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_logs FROM shipping_trigger_logs;
SELECT id, order_id, status FROM shipping_notifications WHERE status='Delivered';
SELECT * FROM shipping_notifications WHERE order_id=1001 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT message, id FROM shipping_notifications WHERE status='Pending' AND order_id IN (1001, 1002);
SELECT * FROM shipping_trigger_logs WHERE trigger_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY trigger_date ASC;
SELECT message, id FROM shipping_notifications WHERE status='Shipped' UNION SELECT update_message, id FROM shipping_updates WHERE update_type='Tracking' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ShippingOrders;
SELECT customer_name, shipping_address FROM ShippingOrders WHERE order_status = 'Pending';
SELECT order_id, customer_name, shipping_address, order_status FROM ShippingOrders WHERE order_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM ShippingOrders WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT notification_id, order_id, notification_message FROM ShippingNotifications ORDER BY notification_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ShippingOrders WHERE order_status = 'Shipped';
SELECT customer_name, shipping_address FROM ShippingOrders WHERE order_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, shipping_address, order_status FROM ShippingOrders WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM ShippingUpdates JOIN ShippingOrders ON ShippingUpdates.order_id = ShippingOrders.order_id WHERE update_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY update_date ASC;
SELECT notification_id, notification_message, notification_date FROM ShippingNotifications WHERE notification_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM shipping_notifications ORDER BY shipment_id DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, recipient_name FROM shipping_notifications WHERE delivery_status='Delivered';
SELECT delivery_address FROM shipping_notifications WHERE recipient_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM shipment_updates WHERE update_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT shipment_id, delivery_date FROM delivery_history WHERE delivery_status='Out for delivery';
SELECT * FROM shipment_updates ORDER BY update_timestamp DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, delivery_status FROM delivery_history WHERE delivery_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT recipient_email FROM notification_subscriptions WHERE notification_type = 'SMS' AND shipment_id = 1001;
SELECT shipment_id, recipient_name, delivery_address FROM shipping_notifications WHERE shipment_id = 2001;
SELECT trigger_name, trigger_timestamp FROM trigger_logs WHERE trigger_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
